mapper.sql: id, name, description, category_id, seller_id, cover,sales_volume, status,min_purchase_num,max_purchase_num, price, origin_price,is_deleted,is_mandatory,packing_fee,stock
mapper.select:
select tg.id, tg.name, tg.description, category_id, seller_id, tg.cover, sales_volume, price, location from takeout_goods as tg join takeout_seller ts on ts.id = tg.seller_id where province = #{province} and city = #{city} and tg.id = (select id from takeout_goods where tg.seller_id = seller_id and price != 0 and status = 2 and is_deleted = 0
order by (select ifnull(avg(score), 0) from takeout_goods_evaluate where goods_id = id) desc
order by price asc
LIMIT 1)

select id, name, description, category_id, cover, price, origin_price, is_mandatory, packing_fee, stock, max_purchase_num, min_purchase_num, ifnull((select avg(score) from takeout_goods_evaluate where takeout_goods_evaluate.goods_id = takeout_goods.id) / 5 * 100, 0) as score, ifnull(sales_volume, ifnull((select SUM(quantity) from takeout_order_item where order_code in (select code from takeout_order where takeout_order.seller_id = takeout_goods.seller_id)), 0)) as sales_volume from takeout_goods where status = 2 and is_deleted = 0 and seller_id = #{sellerId}
and category_id = #{goodsCategoryId}

select id, name, description, category_id, cover, price, origin_price, min_purchase_num, max_purchase_num, packing_fee, stock, status, is_mandatory from takeout_goods where id = #{id} and is_deleted = 0
